TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. It is extremely uncomfortable. 

I wish I could go to space on a space shuttle.

Granted! Unfortunately, the space shuttle runs out of fuel prior to de-orbit. Hope you really like the space shuttle, because you and it are gonna be cozy for a really long time.

I wish I could get the phone call I'm expecting.

Granted, but your phone crashes just when you answer.

I wish I could live in Normal & Modded KSP.

it may happen or not

i wish people don't post in the bridge of death thread ...

Granted, but the people still posting after few days 

i want a luxory and automatic toto toilet

yup you ll get it, just poo in the wild and grab a leaf from a tree, or find a river an ocean or a see sea, sand could work as well still sand may grip a bit and might miss absorbance

i wish i m healthy enough to work as a farmer with plant friends and animal friends and ground friends but well will have to deal with distibrutuion and marketting wich i m 150% allergic because this is close to totally transparent to me most of the time

Edited April 17, 2017 by WinkAllKerb''

Granted. Now you have allergic reactions 100% of time, and there's no difference, are you farming or not.

I wish release 1.3 won't crash the mods.

Granted, the moderators are just fine. Sorry about your add-ons.

I wish I could skip the rest of my week and get to next Monday.

Granted. You missed the first launch to mars that you were supposed to be on.

I wish I could go to Mars.

Granted. You are walking to Mars.

I wish, it's enough warm in the space.

Granted, but the heat transfer is so terrible that it's always too hot and too cold.

I wish for better time management.

granted, its so warm that everything in space melts, killing everyone

I wish for people to like space unsarcasticly in my school

EDIT:DAAARGHHH!! Ninja'd!

and you posted twice

Edited April 21, 2017 by StupidAndy

known for extraction, well after all extraction disambiguations are something common ^^
 

10 hours ago, StupidAndy said:

granted, its so warm that everything in space melts, killing everyone

I wish for people to like space unsarcasticly in my school

EDIT:DAAARGHHH!! Ninja'd!

and you posted twice

Edited April 21, 2017 by WinkAllKerb''
why this post ended in this thread, prolly a refresh weirdness

(gonna answer the above, as Wink didn't post a question)

Granted. They like their personal space, and want everybody else out of it.

I wish I didn't have to act so much tonight.

Granted. You realize it wasn't you who did that. Though, you're still tired.

I wish Rosetta meets Philae.
I wish for more entries of What If.

Granted. You receive back issues for Marvel Comics "What If" series....all the ones nobody liked or bought.

 

I wish for cake.

Granted. The cake has razor blades.

I wish for a Nintendo Switch.

Edited April 22, 2017 by Adstriduum

granted, but I came without any memory

I wish for the bruins game to finish so I can go to bed...oh wait it just did...

I wish that I had a better graphics card in my laptop

granted, but your laptop does not support it and you have to put in your old one again

I wish to go on a zero g plane!

Edited April 22, 2017 by Shadow Wolf56

Granted. Plane accidentally clips into a mountain.

I wish to post here

Edited April 22, 2017 by qzgy

Granted. You're going postal.

I wish explosions in KSP were crreating shockwaves, this would make LES usage more realistic.

Granted, but it lags out your computer and it explodes.

I wish for a small loan of a million USD.

granted, but after interest and taxes it comes to a grand total of -1,000,000 USD

I wish for a purple

Granted, you are stuck on the planet eve until the time hits the 64x number limit

i wish to do nothing
